titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: ROTATOR CUFF REPAIR TYPE FOR SHOULDER REPLACEMENT - Description

div.p: The type of repair carried out on the rotator cuff during Primary Shoulder Replacement Surgery or Revision Shoulder Replacement Surgery.
ROTATOR CUFF REPAIR TYPE FOR SHOULDER REPLACEMENT is recorded where ROTATOR CUFF REPAIRED INDICATOR FOR SHOULDER REPLACEMENT is National Code 'Yes'.
